headline: Is Now the Moment to Reassess Trade Desk After a 69% Slide in 2025?
summary: If you are wondering whether Trade Desk is a beaten-down opportunity or a stock in decline, you are not alone. Now is a good moment to look under the hood rather than just at the share price. After a rough stretch, the stock is down around 8.5% over the last week, 16.3% over the last month, and a steep 68.9% year to date. This has dramatically reset expectations and risk perceptions around the name. Much of the recent price action has been tied to shifting sentiment around digital ad...

headline: Wedbush Cuts The Trade Desk, Inc. (TTD)’s Price Target To $40, Keeps Neutral Rating
summary: The Trade Desk, Inc. (NASDAQ:TTD) is among the 11 Most Oversold S&P 500 Stocks Heading into 2026. On December 8, Wedbush lowered its price target on the stock to $40 from $50, citing competition from demand-side platforms, which are hurting the company’s future growth prospects, according to the firm. However, Wedbush maintained a Neutral rating […]
